    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v3

    Open Enumeration DurationUnit_Enum

      • Description

        Defines the 'Units' that can be applied to Stay restrictions.

      • Value Summary

        Values 
        Name Description
        SUN
        Sunday
        SAT
        Saturday
        FRI
        Friday
        THU
        Thursday
        WED
        Wednesday
        TUES
        Tuesday
        MON
        Monday
        Months
        Duration in months.
        Days
        Duration in days.
        Hours
        Duration in hours.
        Minutes
        Duration in minutes.
